snippet: The Rangers handed the Florida Panthers their ninth straight loss with goals from Brad Richards and Mats Zuccarello in the third period.
abstract: NHL Roundup; New York Rangers beat Florida Panthers, 4-3; other hockey news noted.
lead_paragraph: The Rangers handed the Florida Panthers their ninth straight loss with goals from Brad Richards and Mats Zuccarello in the third period.

headline.main: Rangers Continue Their Run by Adding to Panthers’ Misery
headline.print_headline: Rangers Continue Their Run by Adding to Panthers’ Misery
